query:
ALTER TABLE routes 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS scheduledDate TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS shareToken VARCHAR(36) UNIQUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS isArchived BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS archivedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS distanceUnit ENUM('km', 'miles') DEFAULT 'km',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS startingPointAddress TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS googleCalendarId VARCHAR(255);
